name: Spy Neon Pixel Run 3D
description:
Now play Neon Pixel Run and become a master in Running Games.This is a simple and addictive Neon Pixel Running game and maybe it's an impossible city running game, world hardest running game ever.
Neon Pixel is very simple and easy to start playing, but very very hard to master.
Your mission is control Neon Pixel run on the matching Path and Jump from buildings.
With cool graphics and game play of this city running game , now you can forget the runner in temple, jungle ,stick man and subway stations to concentrate on controlling your Neon Pixel runner to pass all of cities in the game.

Let's take Neon Pixel far who is running.
- How to play -
* Jump from building to press jump button.
* If failed to jump to building, Pixel will fall down.
* You will be able to change Pixel Color according to path.
* If Pixel and path color not matching your game is over.
* Long press the screen to make panda fly

Download it and install it on your smart phone and you really love it.
